CmdLine: set -ex && apt-get update && apt-get upgrade --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests -y && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests     curl pkg-config     libmcrypt-dev libxml2-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev libssl-dev libjpeg-dev libpng-dev libmcrypt-dev libreadline-dev && build_deps="gcc make build-essential" && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests     $build_deps && cd /usr/local/src/ && curl -SL "http://php.net/distributions/php-7.1.6.tar.gz" -o php7.tar.gz && tar -zxf php7.tar.gz && cd php-7.1.6 && ./configure     --prefix=/usr/local     --with-readline     --with-jpeg-dir     --with-png-dir     --enable-fpm     --enable-opcache     --enable-mbstring     --enable-zip     --enable-mysqlnd     --enable-bcmath     --with-gd     --with-openssl     --with-curl     --with-mcrypt     --with-pdo-mysql     --with-fpm-user=www-data     --with-fpm-group=www-data     --with-zlib && make && make install && rm -rf /usr/local/src/* && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && apt-get purge -y --auto-remove $build_deps
Commands.Name: run
